channel.title: Prices in shops change every so often?
channel.description: Right, the prices keeping fkn themselves up, for instance in the shop the interface says they are 120k but there price is 6.5m it will sell at 6.5m for some time then it just fks up and goes to 120k and I don't get at all why?
